channel.title: Should be draw when king v hunter
channel.description: when evil king and hunter left, should be draw

item.title: Should be draw when king v hunter
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The Execution still happens anyway as shown in that one video Magmasword made. Its just a ghost that does it (I know it doesn’t make any sense.) Either way at the very least the king shouldn’t win.

Read full topic

item.title: Should be draw when king v hunter
item.dc:creator: bbiaglla
item.description:
Lol. Who is he voting with. It’s 1v1. Only 2 people alive. His guards kill the other player? It makes no logical sense

item.source: Should be draw when king v hunter

item.title: Should be draw when king v hunter
item.dc:creator: bbiaglla
item.description:
Logically how can he vote him? Who is doing the execution. It’s 1v1. Why can’t the hunter execute king. There is no-one to vote with or against. Should always be draw in 1v1 unless that class can kill the other at night. Then clearly the killer is the winner.

Read full topic
item.source: Should be draw when king v hunter

item.title: Should be draw when king v hunter
item.dc:creator: Navi
item.description:
Yeah, but in that case the king would die before the hunter, which would make the hunter win. I have previously had a game that ended straight after a hunter’s revenge shot (killing the final member of the evils), with the hunter never actually being executed.

Read full topic
